entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense, Syntax highlight and Error Window are badly broken with incremental source generator in Visual Studio 17.0.4 #58523
  • System.InvalidCastException when SemanticModel attempts to bind simple program with a local function as the first statement #58521
  • An invalid IL is emitted for a method access through a type constructed with modified (with modopt) type arguments #58520
  • Stack overflow through type forwarder #58517

Closed

  • Confirm expected behavior for DontCreateIndentOperationForBrokenBracketedArgumentList after discard parsing changes #15813
    Compiler.Next
  • Is there an API syntax node that allows developers to get error messages through error messages? #58503

PullRequests

Created

  • MemberSemanticModel - special case binding CompilationUnit for a simple program. #58527
    Area-Compilers
  • HeapOrReferenceIndexBase.Add - immediately reserve the slot to be resilient to a re-entrancy #58526
    Area-Compilers
  • Update language feature status #58525
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify new integration tests using a source generator #58524
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • semi auto properties: Address feedback of previous PR #58519
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable indenter tests #58488
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Optimize custom modifier check in PEFieldSymbol.EnsureSignatureIsLoaded. #58522
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
